result.title: Hack me! -- technical break
result.content:
Quick message about why there were no posts covering hacks in last few rounds.

I have been asked for some people why there is no more posts about hacking, and I really have to apologize about it. I had some serious problems with hardware (simply I shouldn't have drunk next to my laptop :(), but now it looks like nearly everything is working fine.

I will try that for the next round (269) everything should be back. Maybe I will also try to cover passed rounds.

Again I am really sorry and thanks for asking!
